Package com.killian

Class Billiard

java.lang.Object
com.killian.Ball
com.killian.Billiard
public class Billiard
extends Ball
Billiard class to represent a billiard ball. Extends Ball.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description

    Constructor method for the Billiard class, assigns appropriate values to initial setting of the billiard.

  • Constructor Details

    • Billiard

      public Billiard​(double x, double y, double ratio, java.lang.String col, int index)
      Constructor method for the Billiard class, assigns appropriate values to initial setting of the billiard.
      Parameters:
      x - Double value of the initial X position of the billiard.
      y - Double value of the initial X position of the billiard.
      ratio - Double value of the ratio of this screen.
      col - String colour value the billiard is to be.
      index - Integer index value of this billiard in the parent array.
